thread.title: Sony is crowd-funding a premium smartwatch
thread.title_full: Sony is crowd-funding a premium smartwatch

author: Deccan
title: Sony is crowd-funding a premium smartwatch
text:
Deccan Chronicle | August 31, 2015, 15.38 pm Wena smartwatch On its own crowd-funding platform in Japan, Sony is showcasing a new premium looking smartwatch called Wena. It is touted for three primary features — NFC wallet compatibility, notifications through vibration and a customisable LED light, and activity tracker.
The watch has a chic metal body with hairline finish, and a classy traditional look of an analog watch. It is also available in a premium black metal model.
The Wena watch is only compatible with iOS devices.
